content: the 6th round and you re done i hope you love your new beanie if you share photos of your cosy new slouchy on instagram do tag me so i can admire 😃 if you come across any errors or need help with this pattern feel free to get in contact with me through one of my socials or by email i may not be able to respond immediately as i m unwell but i d love to hear from you 👩🦼 wheelie x instagram wheeliemadeitcrochet youtube wheelie made it crochet ravelry wheeliemadeit email wheeliemadeit@gmail com wheelie made it crochet puff slouchy page 5
